about.title: About me
about.about_me: I’m a full-stack web developer focused on building custom websites that meet the specific needs of businesses. I like the process of taking an idea from concept to reality, seeing a project grow from nothing into an engaging product. I work on both front-end design and back-end architecture for secure sites that can evolve alongside your business.

kasa.name: Kasa
kasa.description: Front-end template of an online accommodation rental platform, allowing users to browse listings with detailed descriptions, photos, and reviews. It is optimized for all screen types: desktop, tablet, and mobile. The project uses React and React Router with reusable components, state and side-effect management. The responsive design was developed with Sass.

nina_carducci.name: Nina Carducci
nina_carducci.description: This project involved the optimization of Nina Carducci's portfolio website by improving performance, accessibility and SEO. I conducted audits using Lighthouse and GTMetrix to identify areas for enhancement and implemented optimizations. The full optimization report is available on the GitHub repository along with the optimized code

mvg.name: Mon Vieux Grimoire
mvg.description: An API for managing a book catalog and rating platform built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It features user authentication, session management, CRUD functionality, and automatic calculation of average ratings. The project also includes middleware for image optimization, security enforcement, and event logging.  (Note: The deployment server may be idle, so a delay might occur before the connection is established.)

cristina_portfolio.name: Cristina Jiménez
cristina_portfolio.description: Professional portfolio of Cristina Jiménez, a communication and international marketing specialist. The project features a modern user interface built with Next.js using static site generation (SSG), along with a CMS (Strapi) that allows Cristina to update her portfolio's content and styling through an admin interface.
